import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' export default class User extends React.Component { state = { questions: 10, category: "General Knowledge", difficulty: "Medium" } handleFormChange(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) console.log(this.state) } render() { return ( <>

Select Parameters for Test

Number of Questions this.handleFormChange(event)} name='questions' value={this.state.questions} as='select' custom> Test Category Question Difficulty
) } }
